meals.ingredients: Rolled oats, almond milk, almond butter, banana, cinnamon
meals.instructions: Combine ingredients, refrigerate overnight, add banana before serving

meals.ingredients: Brown rice, edamame, carrots, cucumber, avocado, nori sheets, sesame seeds, soy sauce, rice vinegar, ginger
meals.instructions: Arrange rice in bowl. Top with edamame, vegetables, and avocado. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and crumbled nori. Drizzle with sauce.

meals.ingredients: Black beans, corn, bell peppers, onion, whole grain tortillas, enchilada sauce
meals.instructions: Fill tortillas with bean mixture, roll, top with sauce, bake

meals.ingredients: Banana, spinach, protein powder, almond milk, berries, nuts
meals.instructions: Blend ingredients except toppings, pour in bowl, add toppings

meals.ingredients: Quinoa, parsley, mint, tomatoes, cucumber, lemon juice, olive oil, green onions
meals.instructions: Cook quinoa and cool. Mix with chopped herbs, vegetables, lemon juice, and olive oil.

meals.ingredients: Chickpeas, cauliflower, spinach, tomatoes, onion, garlic, curry powder, coconut milk, brown rice
meals.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic, add spices, vegetables, chickpeas, and coconut milk. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Serve over rice.

meals.ingredients: Chia seeds, coconut milk, mango, vanilla extract, maple syrup
meals.instructions: Mix chia seeds with coconut milk and vanilla, refrigerate overnight. Top with fresh mango and a drizzle of maple syrup.

meals.ingredients: Chickpeas, quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, kale, avocado, tahini dressing
meals.instructions: Arrange cooked quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, chickpeas, and kale in a bowl. Top with avocado and drizzle with tahini dressing.

meals.ingredients: Green lentils, mushrooms, carrots, peas, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, cauliflower, potatoes, olive oil, herbs
meals.instructions: Cook lentils. Sauté vegetables and combine with lentils and broth. Top with mashed cauliflower and potato. Bake until golden.

meals.ingredients: Chia seeds, protein powder, almond milk, berries, honey
meals.instructions: Mix ingredients except berries, refrigerate overnight, top with berries

meals.ingredients: Chickpeas, spinach, tomatoes, onion, garlic, curry spices, brown rice
meals.instructions: Sauté onions and spices, add ingredients, simmer, serve over rice

meals.ingredients: Firm tofu, broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, snap peas, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, brown rice
meals.instructions: Press and cube tofu. Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger. Add tofu and sauce. Serve over brown rice.

meals.ingredients: Firm tofu, nutritional yeast, turmeric, garlic powder, onion, bell pepper, spinach, olive oil
meals.instructions: Crumble tofu and sauté with vegetables and spices until golden and vegetables are tender.

meals.ingredients: Quinoa, black beans, corn, avocado, lime, cilantro
meals.instructions: Combine ingredients, dress with lime juice

meals.ingredients: Chickpeas, parsley, cilantro, onion, garlic, cumin, coriander, quinoa, cucumber, tomato, tahini, lemon juice
meals.instructions: Process chickpeas with herbs, spices, and aromatics. Form into balls and bake until crispy. Serve over quinoa with vegetables and tahini sauce.

meals.ingredients: Chia seeds, coconut milk, mango, vanilla extract, maple syrup
meals.instructions: Mix chia seeds with coconut milk and vanilla, refrigerate overnight. Top with fresh mango and a drizzle of maple syrup.

meals.ingredients: Green lentils, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, tomatoes, spinach, herbs
meals.instructions: Sauté vegetables, add lentils, broth, and tomatoes. Simmer until lentils are tender. Add spinach at the end.

meals.ingredients: Tofu, broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, coconut milk, curry paste, brown rice
meals.instructions: Sauté vegetables and tofu, add coconut milk and curry paste, serve over rice

meals.ingredients: Chia seeds, coconut milk, mango, vanilla extract, maple syrup
meals.instructions: Mix chia seeds with coconut milk and vanilla, refrigerate overnight. Top with fresh mango and a drizzle of maple syrup.

meals.ingredients: White beans, kale, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, rosemary, thyme, olive oil
meals.instructions: Sauté vegetables until soft. Add beans, broth, and herbs. Simmer until flavors meld. Add kale at the end and cook until wilted.

meals.ingredients: Eggplant, chickpeas, tomatoes, onion, garlic, cumin, paprika, cinnamon, parsley, olive oil, lemon
meals.instructions: Sauté eggplant, onion, and garlic. Add spices, tomatoes, and chickpeas. Simmer until eggplant is tender. Garnish with parsley and lemon.
